description:
cmd/gc: accept switches on comparable arrays.

The compiler is incorrectly rejecting switches on arrays of
comparable types. It also doesn't catch incomparable structs
when typechecking the switch, leading to unreadable errors
during typechecking of the generated code.

Fixes issue 3894.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d68605d10a6b ***

cmd/gc: accept switches on comparable arrays.

The compiler is incorrectly rejecting switches on arrays of
comparable types. It also doesn't catch incomparable structs
when typechecking the switch, leading to unreadable errors
during typechecking of the generated code.

Fixes issue 3894.

R=rsc
CC=gobot, golang-dev, r, remy
http://codereview.appspot.com/6442074

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: gobot@golang.org, golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org, remy@archlinux.org),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

We'll want a test too, thanks.

-rob

On 2012/08/01 19:18:10, r wrote:
> We'll want a test too, thanks.

Do you mean a test in test/fixedbugs or is it something specific you want to be tested?

Rémy.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

Please take another look.

A fixedbugs test would be good.

-rob

tests look good after deleting extra file.
leaving the rest for rsc.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6442074/diff/9001/test/fixedbugs/bug447.go
File test/fixedbugs/bug447.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6442074/diff/9001/test/fixedbugs/bug447.go#newcode7
test/fixedbugs/bug447.go:7: // Issue 3894: compiler refuses switch on arrays.
thanks for this, but the test in switch.go covers this, so a fixedbugs isn't necessary after all. i didn't realize that's what you were doing.
you can delete this file.

subject: code review 6442074: cmd/gc: accept switches on comparable arrays.
